Title: Denial of Service in @hapi/hapi
Description: Versions of `@hapi/hapi` are vulnerable to Denial of Service. The CORS request handler has a vulnerability which will cause the function to throw a system error if the header contains some invalid values. If no unhandled exception handler is available, the application will exist, allowing an attacker to shut down services.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 18.4.1, all versions starting from 19.0.0 before 19.1.1
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 18.4.1 before 19.0.0, all versions starting from 19.1.1
